sentences.english: Cement clinker of green colour can be obtained by using chromium oxide am a colorant.
sentences.chinese: 以氧化鉻作爲着色劑，可以燒成綠色水泥熟料。

sentences.english: This paper describes calculation method of a circular tent-shaped clinker warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹圓形帳篷式熟料庫的結構計算。

sentences.english: The clinker discharged from grate cooler will be transported by chain conveyor to the top of clinker silo.
sentences.chinese: 從篦冷機卸出的熟料，鏈鬥機送往熟料庫頂。

sentences.english: The clinker discharged from grate cooler will be transported by chain conveyor to the top of clinker silo.
sentences.chinese: 從篦冷機卸出的熟料，鏈鬥機送往熟料庫頂。

sentences.english: The smelted liquid slag then change to cement mature after sprinkle cooling.
sentences.chinese: 冶煉後的液態渣經過熱潑等處理即成爲水泥熟料。

sentences.english: The particle composition but again decided by the clinker burning and grinding.
sentences.chinese: 顆粒組成又取決於熟料的燒成和粉磨。

sentences.english: The size reduction process of rotary kiln clinker with grinding aids was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助磨劑作用下旋窯熟料的微細化過程。

sentences.english: Has the company calculated the specific heat consumption of clinker production?
sentences.chinese: 企業是否計算熟料生產單位熱耗？

sentences.english: This is a research on using marl and tailings from copper are and zinc ore to produce low energy consumption cement.
sentences.chinese: 研究利用泥灰岩和銅鋅尾礦代粘土燒製水泥熟料。

sentences.english: Quality stability of raw meal influenced the clinker quality.
sentences.chinese: 生料質量的穩定影響着出窯熟料質量。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cement setting time is shortened after compounding of two clinkers.
sentences.chinese: 兩種熟料複合後，水泥體系的凝結時間會明顯縮短。

sentences.english: The chamotte returns to the main floor to greet him unexpectedly is also a tie.
sentences.chinese: 熟料回到主場迎接他的竟然又是平局。

sentences.english: The pulverizing of the clinker were the results of combined the action of silicated reaction, iron expansion and lime hydration.
sentences.chinese: 鐵膨脹和石灰消解共同作用是熟料窯外粉化的原因。

sentences.english: The main ingredients for cold dishes are for the most part ready food.
sentences.chinese: 涼菜切配的主要原料大部分是熟料。

sentences.english: The sintering process of the high A/S clinker can select the dose of the third component.
sentences.chinese: 高鋁硅比熟料燒成工藝宜選用三組份配方。

sentences.english: The rolling ring will crack under the alternative-stress.
sentences.chinese: 熟料窯滾圈在交變應力的作用下易發生開裂。

definition: sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
